SorcererLevel8Spells.Name: Dominate Monster
SorcererLevel8Spells.Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel8Spells.Name: Earthquake
SorcererLevel8Spells.Description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel8Spells.Name: Incendiary Cloud
SorcererLevel8Spells.Description: A swirling cloud of smoke shot through with white-hot embers appears in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range.

SorcererLevel8Spells.Name: Power Word Stun
SorcererLevel8Spells.Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range, leaving it dumbfounded.

SorcererLevel8Spells.Name: Sunburst
SorcererLevel8Spells.Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.
